channel.title: test on badsysadmin
channel.description: Recent content in test on badsysadmin

item.title: Test Blog
item.description: Eventually this site will have tips and tricks for bad system administrators to use in order to save face with technical support both internal and external. Some advice may be tongue in cheek. Some may be vicious satire. But all of it is meant to show you where you have fallen short and become a bad sysadmin. Stay Tuned!
